notes.text: kog'd a couple days back. i love hypno and think its very underrated. the gemini summon isn't the biggest deal with powerful rebirth. i chose to run less traps for balance because i felt that i opened recombo more this way. if i were to make any changes it'd probably be removing grey for kid because sometimes you don't have enough aliens when you're dumping with recombo, AND searching with it too.  recombos can be dead late game and it sucks to only have grey left to search for in a pinch.
